text: allaah unaka sahaayak hai, jo eemaan laaye. vah unahen andheron se nikaalata hai aur prakaash mein laata hai aur jo kaafir (vishvaasaheen) hain, unake sahaayak taagoot (unake mithya poojy) hain. jo unhen prakaash se andheron kee aur le jaate hain. yahee naarakee hain, jo usamen sadaavaasee honge
